Class PlayerShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Ship
        • PlayerShip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntitySuiteInterface

    public class PlayerShip
extends Ship
    This class defines what the player ship is, and how it functions. It is an extension of the abstract Ship class, therefore behaves very similarly to other ships. Contains the methods required for the player to interact with it.
    Author:
    Andrew
